original_text: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred.
korean_text: 이는 그들의 종족을 따른 베냐민 자손이라 계수된 자가 사만 오천육백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Benjamin
and they that were numbered of them
were forty and five thousand and six hundred
